verses.text: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w*, \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w taken|strong="H2388"\w* \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w subdue|strong="H7286"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* turn \w the|strong="H0559"\w* backs \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* go \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* humble \w the|strong="H6440"\w* great ones \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w gates|strong="H1817"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* brass, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* burst \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w hidden|strong="H4301"\w* \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* concealed riches \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w secret|strong="H4565"\w* \w places|strong="H4565"\w*: \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou mayest \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* thee \w by|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w sake|strong="H4616"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* elect, \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* thee \w by|strong="H7121"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* likeness \w of|strong="H5650"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* thou hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w else|strong="H5750"\w*: \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w besides|strong="H2108"\w* \w me|strong="H0589"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w girded|strong="H0247"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H0589"\w*:

\w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w rising|strong="H4217"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w west|strong="H4628"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w besides|strong="H1107"\w* \w me|strong="H0589"\w*. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w else|strong="H5750"\w*:

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* form \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w create|strong="H1254"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w create|strong="H1254"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*.

Drop \w down|strong="H5140"\w* dew, ye \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w from|strong="H0776"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w clouds|strong="H7834"\w* \w rain|strong="H7491"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w just|strong="H6664"\w*: let \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* bud \w forth|strong="H6779"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* saviour: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w justice|strong="H6664"\w* \w spring|strong="H6779"\w* \w up|strong="H6779"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w created|strong="H1254"\w* \w him|strong="H6509"\w*.

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0854"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* gainsayeth \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w maker|strong="H3335"\w*, \w a|strong="H0369"\w* \w sherd|strong="H2789"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w earthen|strong="H2789"\w* pots: \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w clay|strong="H2789"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0854"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* fashioneth \w it|strong="H6213"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* art thou \w making|strong="H6467"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w work|strong="H6467"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w without|strong="H0369"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*?

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* saith \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H4100"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* begettest thou? \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* dost thou \w bring|strong="H3205"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*?

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w maker|strong="H3335"\w*: \w Ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w things|strong="H0857"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w come|strong="H0857"\w*, \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w work|strong="H6467"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w give|strong="H6680"\w* ye \w charge|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w created|strong="H1254"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*: \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* forth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w host|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* raised \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w up|strong="H5782"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w justice|strong="H6664"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w direct|strong="H7971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w captives|strong="H1546"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* ransom, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* presents, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* labour \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* merchandise \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Sabaim, \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* stature \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* thins: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* walk \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H1961"\w* bound \w with|strong="H0413"\w* manacles: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H6419"\w* \w supplication|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee: \w only|strong="H0389"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w besides|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

Verily thou art \w a|strong="H3478"\w* \w hidden|strong="H5641"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w the|strong="H3467"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3467"\w* saviour.

\w They|strong="H1571"\w* \w are|strong="H1571"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* forgers \w of|strong="H3605"\w* errors \w are|strong="H1571"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* confusion.

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w eternal|strong="H5769"\w* \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w*: \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w ever|strong="H5703"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w created|strong="H1254"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* very \w maker|strong="H3335"\w* thereof: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w create|strong="H1254"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* vain: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w other|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* secret, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w dark|strong="H2822"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*: \w Seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* vain. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w justice|strong="H6664"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* \w right|strong="H6664"\w* \w things|strong="H4339"\w*.

\w Assemble|strong="H6908"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H5375"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w draw|strong="H5066"\w* \w near|strong="H5066"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, ye \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*: \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w set|strong="H0935"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* work, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* \w god|strong="H0410"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w*.

\w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* ye, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5066"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w consult|strong="H3289"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: \w who|strong="H4310"\w* hath \w declared|strong="H5046"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* beginning, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* hath foretold \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w time|strong="H0227"\w*? \w Have|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w else|strong="H5750"\w* \w besides|strong="H2108"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*? \w A|strong="H8085"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* saviour, \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w besides|strong="H2108"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H5750"\w* converted \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* ye \w ends|strong="H0657"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w other|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* myself, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w justice|strong="H6666"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* knee \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* bowed \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* tongue \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* swear.

\w Therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w*: \w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* justices \w and|strong="H3068"\w* empire: \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* come \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* resist \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* confounded.
In the Lord shall all the seed of Israel be justified and praised.
